name: Seeds of Eru
description: Meet S.A.R.A. (Survivale Assurance Robotic Assistent). S.A.R.A. is programmed to ensure the survival of the only Eru-tree on her planet. This tree is the last of its kind en to ensure survival, she has to catch as many Eru-seeds as possible when they are dropping. Help S.A.R.A. with her quest!
